name: Game of the Generals (Mikhail_Panzo)
description:
This game is still in development, it is just public to test multiplayer functions.
Expect a release in the later part of December 2022, along with rules of the games in this description.

Update: The game is somewhat complete and can be playable. Rules of the game will be placed in the description soon. For now, the rules are based on this: https://ggsalpakan.weebly.com/rules.html
